definition[0]: not good enough, big enough, skilled enough etc for a particular purpose
example[1]: The new air conditioning system proved inadequate.

example[3]: The parking facilities are inadequate for a busy shopping centre.
definition[1]: someone who feels inadequate thinks other people are better, more skilful, more intelligent etc than they are
example[4]: The teacher made us feel inadequate and stupid if we made mistakes.
